html:
Design to Production 2: Music Video Production & Pixellation Projects

In this module, students will collaborate in supervised production groups to create their original response in studio and on location to the title brief resulting in a short no-dialogue fiction or music video project. Students will also produce an annotated process workbook that shows the development of their practice.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Conceptualise, plan, and produce an original short-form film and media project in response to the brief, demonstrating applied creative thinking.

+  Apply technical, collaborative, and organisational skills across important areas of media production, including cinematography, sound, editing, and visual effects, demonstrating awareness of industry practice standards.

+  Solve creative and production challenges through iterative development, feedback, and critical reflection, showing flexibility and problem-solving within team environments.

+  Evaluate their own creative process and final outcomes, demonstrating self-directed learning, and awareness of professional standards.

Module Content:
